name: Adrift in Tandem
description:
You are two space cadets, one is specialized in managing heavy guns, the other one in managing plasma cutting mining beams,  you are en route to your base while you get assaulted by space pirates.

Each of them can handle only their type of turret, the other one will drive, can you swap places and survive the incoming onslaught?

Controls

H to switch places!
P1 (Right player) - ARROWS Movement and gun turret rotation  SPACE to shoot!
P2 (Left player) - WASD Movement and laser turret rotation , Right Control to shoot the laser

Projectiles are effective against enemy ships, while laser can cut down asteroids and enemy shields! Survive the waves until the end to win!

Why did we make this game?

When we saw the theme "collaboration", the first thought each of us had was about the local coop game that we loved from our childhood.

We could not miss the chance to make a game of this genre.

We started by asking ourselves "what is the best way to make a collaborative local multiplayer game?" and one of the first ideas we had was to share and swap the controls of the same character with your teammate. 

Only the most coordinated and collaborative couples of players will be able to complete our game, as every team skill will be tested.
